name: Duke Grabowski, Mighty Swashbuckler
description: Duke Grabowski: Mighty Swashbuckler is a classic point-and-click adventure, created with love by an indie team that includes LucasArts alumni, Bill Tiller (The Curse of Monkey Island, Steven Spielberg's The Dig, Indiana Jones and the Infernal Machine).
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: 2.4GHz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 610 1GB RAM or equivalent Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2GHz Quad Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 670 2GB RAM or equivalent Storage: 3 GB available space
